com.yahoo.component.provider

Interface Freezable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Data, DataList<DATATYPE>, ListenableFreezable, PageElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChoice, AbstractData, AbstractDataList, AbstractList, ArrayDataList, BackedOverridableQueryProfile, Choice, CopyOnWriteContent, DefaultErrorHit, FreezableClass, FreezableComponent, FreezableSimpleComponent, Group, GroupList, Hit, HitGroup, HitList, ListenableFreezableClass, MapChoice, OverridableQueryProfile, PageTemplate, PeakQpsSearcher.QpsHit, Placeholder, Query, QueryProfile, QueryProfileType, QueryProfileVariants, QueryProfileVariants.FieldValues, Renderer, Request, Response, ResponseHeaders, ResponseStatus, Result, RootGroup, Section, SectionHitGroup, Source

    public interface Freezable
    A class which may be irreversibly frozen. Any attempt to change the state of this class after freezing throws an IllegalStateException.
    Author:
    bratseth

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void freeze()
      Freezes this component to prevent further changes.
      boolean isFrozen()
      Inspect whether this object can be changed.

    • Method Detail

      • freeze

        void freeze()
        Freezes this component to prevent further changes. Override this to freeze internal data structures and dependent objects. Overrides must call super. Calling freeze on an already frozen class must have no effect.

      • isFrozen

        boolean isFrozen()
        Inspect whether this object can be changed. If the object is immutable from construction, this should return true, even if freeze() never has been invoked.
        Returns:
        true if this instance is in an immutable state, false otherwise
        Since:
        5.1.4
